title: من 2017 إلى 2025.. 3 لاعبين يبحثون عن مجد جديد مع منتخب مصر
summary: يتطلع 3 لاعبين في منتخب مصر لتكرار التأهل إلى كأس العالم للمرة الثانية في تاريخهم وذلك عندما يلتقون بـ جيبوتي في المغرب.

title: PBS Distribution, Blink Films Secure Major International Sales Ahead of Mipcom (EXCLUSIVE)
summary: PBS Distribution and Blink Films have closed sales for “Ultimate Crash Test” and “Terror on the Space Station,” building momentum ahead of Mipcom. title: These Nothing smartphones can now record calls with the press of a button
summary: Nothing has rolled out an update for Essential Space that brings an audio call recording feature to its smartphones. With this update, Nothing smartphone users will be able to start recording calls by long-pressing the Essential Key or by tapping the "Start recording" option in the notification tha…
